abstract: A longstanding tradition of the Berkshire Hathaway annual meeting has been the yearly dinner hosted by Alice Schroeder, who Warren E. Buffett chose to write his biography, “The Snowball,” which was published last September.
lead_paragraph: A longstanding tradition of the Berkshire Hathaway annual meeting has been the yearly dinner hosted by Alice Schroeder, who Warren E. Buffett chose to write his biography, “The Snowball,” which was published last September.
